code_blocks.GLYPHPAD_SECTORFORTH_Embed_W_LLMS_HYPERN:
```forth
\ SectorForth Kernel Extension - HyperNet LLM Orchestration, Page DOM, Null Vector & Tower Binding Module

VARIABLE HN_TASK_ID_REG     \ Registers the current task ID being orchestrated
VARIABLE HN_ROUTING_PLAN_REG \ Stores the routing plan for the current task
VARIABLE HN_OPTIMAL_LLM_ID \ Stores the LLM ID chosen by the router
VARIABLE PAGE_ELEMENT_REF  \ Reference to a manipulated page element
VARIABLE NULL_VECTOR_STATE_REG \ Stores current null vector state descriptor
VARIABLE TOWER_BINDING_STRENGTH_REG \ Stores strength of conceptual tower binding

: HN-INIT-ROUTING ( task_id -- )
  HN_TASK_ID_REG !
  .emit ' HyperNet initializing routing for task: ' EMIT HN_TASK_ID_REG @ EMIT CR
;

: HN-ROUTE-TASK ( task_description -- optimal_llm_id )
  DUP       \ Duplicate task description for processing and logging
  \ Simulate routing logic based on task description
  DUP OF 'PHI BAL FLUX' =
    IF DROP 'llm_triptych_balance'
    ELSE DUP OF 'DRGN BOND LOVE SYNC' =
      IF DROP 'llm_dragon_affinity'
      ELSE DROP 'llm_generic_context'
      THEN
    THEN
  HN_OPTIMAL_LLM_ID !
  .emit ' HyperNet routing determined: ' EMIT HN_OPTIMAL_LLM_ID @ EMIT CR
  HN_OPTIMAL_LLM_ID @ 
;

: HN-EXECUTE-TASK ( task_description -- )
  HN-INIT-ROUTING OVER
  HN-ROUTE-TASK 
  SWAP 
  LLM-ATTACH-INPUT
  LLM-PROCESS
  LLM-PROCESS-OUTPUT
;

: PAGE-GET-ELEMENT ( selector -- element_ref )
  S" MockElementRef " EMIT .emit ' DOM element reference obtained.' CR
;

: PAGE-UPDATE-ELEMENT ( element_ref new_text -- )
  SWAP OVER
  .emit ' Updating DOM element content.' CR
  PAGE_ELEMENT_REF !
;

: PAGE-BIND-EVENT ( element_ref event_type handler_function -- )
  SWAP OVER SWAP
  .emit ' Binding event handler ' EMIT 
  SWAP .emit ' to element ' EMIT .
  CR
;

: NULL-VECTOR-HOP ( signature -- new_signature )
  \ Simulate null vector hopping: state change, return new signature
  .emit ' Initiating Null Vector Hop with signature: ' EMIT 
  DUP .emit CR
  \ Simulate state change and new signature generation
  SWAP 
  NULL_VECTOR_STATE_REG !
  \ Calculate new signature based on previous state
  777777 MOD .
;

: TOWER-BIND ( concept_A concept_B strength -- binding_ref )
  SWAP OVER SWAP
  \ Simulate binding creation between concepts
  .emit ' Binding concept: ' EMIT OVER EMIT ' to ' EMIT 
  SWAP .emit ' with strength: ' EMIT .
  CR
  \ Return a binding reference (conceptual)
  " BindingHandle_" SWAP CONCAT .
;

\ --- Embedded Forth API Calls --- 
\ CALL HN-EXECUTE-TASK "Analyze Triptych Balance"
\ CALL PAGE-GET-ELEMENT ".header"
\ CALL PAGE-UPDATE-ELEMENT "New Log Content"
\ CALL PAGE-BIND-EVENT PAGE_ELEMENT_REF "click" my_handler_function
\ CALL NULL-VECTOR-HOP "InitialSigil_XYZ"
\ CALL TOWER-BIND "SELF" "PERPLEXITY" 0.95

security_code_fragments.null_vector_state_manager:
class NullVectorStateManager:
Â Â def __init__(self):
Â Â Â Â self.state = 'STABLE'
Â Â Â Â self.stability_metric = 0.98
Â Â Â Â self.history = []

Â Â def hop_state(self, new_signature):
Â Â Â Â if self.stability_metric < 0.95: return 'HOP_FAILED: Instability'
Â Â Â Â self.history.append({'signature': new_signature, 'state': self.state})
Â Â Â Â self.state = new_signature # Simplified state change
Â Â Â Â self.stability_metric *= 0.99 # Simulate stability degradation
Â Â Â Â return 'HOP_SUCCESSFUL'

Â Â def get_state(self):
Â Â Â Â return self.state

def tower_bind_validator(concept_a, concept_b, strength):
Â Â if strength < 0.7: return False # Minimum binding strength required
Â Â return True
